mapper.sql: a.merchant_id AS "merchantId", a.merchant_no AS "merchantNo", a.email AS "email", a.contry_name AS "contryName", a.type AS "type", a.certificate_type AS "certificateType", a.company_name AS "companyName", a.province_code AS "provinceCode", a.province_name AS "provinceName", a.city_code AS "cityCode", a.city_name AS "cityName", a.county_code AS "countyCode", a.county_name AS "countyName", a.business_address AS "businessAddress", a.website AS "website", a.business_license_no AS "businessLicenseNo", a.business_license_end_time AS "businessLicenseEndTime", "contactorCertificateEndTime", a.contactor_phone AS "contactorPhone", a.org_customs_code AS "orgCustomsCode", a.supplier_name AS "supplierName", a.enterprise_name AS "enterpriseName", a.cbms_supplier_category_name AS "cbmsSupplierCategoryName", a.cbms_trade_type_name AS "cbmsTradeTypeName", a.contry_code AS "contryCode", a.merchant_pos_code AS "merchantPosCode", a.company_phone AS "companyPhone", a.legal_mobile AS "legalMobile", a.charge_type AS "chargeType", a.ipc_no AS "ipcNo", a.permits_accounts AS "permitsAccounts", a.legal_certificate_front AS "legalCertificateFront", a.legal_certificate_back AS "legalCertificateBack", a.tax_registration_certificate AS "taxRegistrationCertificate", a.organization_code_certificate AS "organizationCodeCertificate", a.business_license_file AS "businessLicenseFile", a.trademark_regis_photo_address AS "trademarkRegisPhotoAddress", a.commodity_quality_photo_address AS "commodityQualityPhotoAddress"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cbms_merchant_suppliersetting( merchant_id, merchant_no, email, contry_name, type, certificate_type, company_name, province_code, province_name, city_code, city_name, county_code, county_name, business_address, website, business_license_no, business_license_end_time, organization_code, tax_registration_certificate_no, business_scope, llegalperson, legal_idcard, legal_certificate_end_time, contactor, contactor_idcard_no, contactor_certificate_end_time, contactor_phone, org_customs_code, supplier_name, enterprise_name, electricity_url, org_customs_name, central_office_number, cbms_enterprise_type_name, cbms_supplier_category_name, cbms_trade_type_name, contry_code, merchant_pos_code, company_phone, legal_mobile, charge_type, ipc_no, permits_accounts, legal_certificate_front, legal_certificate_back, tax_registration_certificate, organization_code_certificate, business_license_file, trademark_regis_photo_address, commodity_quality_photo_address ) VALUES ( #{merchantId}, #{merchantNo}, #{email}, #{contryName}, #{type}, #{certificateType}, #{companyName}, #{provinceCode}, #{provinceName}, #{cityCode}, #{cityName}, #{countyCode}, #{countyName}, #{businessAddress}, #{website}, #{businessLicenseNo}, #{businessLicenseEndTime}, #{organizationCode}, #{taxRegistrationCertificateNo}, #{businessScope}, #{llegalperson}, #{legalIdcard}, #{legalCertificateEndTime}, #{contactor}, #{contactorIdcardNo}, #{contactorCertificateEndTime}, #{contactorPhone}, #{orgCustomsCode}, #{supplierName}, #{enterpriseName}, #{electricityUrl}, #{orgCustomsName}, #{centralOfficeNumber}, #{cbmsEnterpriseTypeName}, #{cbmsSupplierCategoryName}, #{cbmsTradeTypeName}, #{contryCode}, #{merchantPosCode}, #{companyPhone}, #{legalMobile}, #{chargeType}, #{ipcNo}, #{permitsAccounts}, #{legalCertificateFront}, #{legalCertificateBack}, #{taxRegistrationCertificate}, #{organizationCodeCertificate}, #{businessLicenseFile}, #{trademarkRegisPhotoAddress}, #{commodityQualityPhotoAddress} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cbms_merchant_suppliersetting SET merchant_id = #{merchantId}, merchant_no = #{merchantNo}, email = #{email}, contry_name = #{contryName}, type = #{type}, certificate_type = #{certificateType}, company_name = #{companyName}, province_code = #{provinceCode}, province_name = #{provinceName}, city_code = #{cityCode}, city_name = #{cityName}, county_code = #{countyCode}, organization_code = #{organizationCode}, tax_registration_certificate_no = #{taxRegistrationCertificateNo}, business_scope = #{businessScope}, llegalperson = #{llegalperson}, legal_idcard = #{electricityUrl}, org_customs_name = #{orgCustomsName}, central_office_number = #{centralOfficeNumber}, cbms_enterprise_type_name = #{cbmsEnterpriseTypeName}, cbms_supplier_category_name = #{legalCertificateBack}, tax_registration_certificate = #{taxRegistrationCertificate}, organization_code_certificate = #{organizationCodeCertificate}, business_license_file = #{businessLicenseFile}, trademark_regis_photo_address = #{trademarkRegisPhotoAddress}, commodity_quality_photo_address = #{commodityQualityPhotoAddress} WHERE merchant_id = #{id}
